entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text:
@JoeBiden Whomever is writing these tweets for Biden..
you’re just as ignorant as Biden himself..

 Reopening America is NOT about the stock market

it’s about avoiding a depression, 

Which would cause FAR MORE death & destruction than covid19. 

Maybe that’s what Democrats want😡
